jiwana mila palanaya kirima sandaha saha aarthika arbudaya hamuwe rajaye badu aadayama wadikara ganima sandaha aanduwa gath kriyamarga dadi wiwechanayanta bhajanaya wima pasugiya kalaye siduwu athara ee nisama samahara thindu thirana wenas karannata ho pasupasata ganimatada aanduwata siduwiya. 11%kwa pawathi wat badu prathishathaya 15% dakwa wadi kirimath, nagunu mahajana wirodhaya hamuwe saukhya ha adhyapanaya sandaha wadi karana lada wat badu aya nokarana bawata prakasha kirimata siduwimath, ema wat badu ayakirim shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwe abhiyogayata lakwimen wat badu panatha pasupasata ganimata aanduwata siduwimath eki thindu thirana wenas kirima sambandhayen athi mathaka hondama udaharanaya.
